parameters: \N<Yuia>What is it? What do you want with us?

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>...I've seen everything that happened. I'm sorry, but could
you please follow me without saying anything?

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>That... I was told to keep it a secret... but I can't. The
opportunity is now or never... so it's better to meet while
you can.

\N<Yuia>What are you talking about? Who exactly are you saying we
should meet?

\N<Segi>...I can't run away. For Lord Yuia... for Riia. I have to do
this...

\N<Segi>...I can't run away. For Lord Yuia's sake... for Riia's
sake. I have to do this...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.
\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Your turn isn't up yet. What business do you have here?
\N<Segi>I heard that Irime's match is about to start...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmm... The match between Irime and Rozaro, is it? If you
wish to watch, head to the spectator seats.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>The training assembly is currently being held inside. Those
who are not participants cannot proceed any further.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>...You've come. I wonder how many times we've had
conversations like this here.
\N<Segi>...Yes, it does feel a bit strange.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Now, as per tradition, we need to process the temporary
exemption for your husband Yuia's charges. Present the
relevant documents.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>You must have experienced various things on your way here.
There must have been times when you blamed yourself, cursed
yourself, and even despaired. Yet, here you are standing
before me.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>I once said that your "pride as a woman" might be the core
of your strength. My thoughts on that haven't changed.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>But... I understand how difficult it is to maintain one's
strength while being consumed by that spirit medicine. I've
seen it happen to countless women.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>That's why I think... it's not bad to be swept up and
carried away by something before your eyes. Yes, as long as
you don't lose sight of what's most important to you.

\N<Segi>...Thank you very much. And for your advice... I am
grateful.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>The training session is currently being held inside. Those
who are not participants cannot proceed any further.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.
\N<Training Troops Receptionist>What do you want? You're not scheduled to appear today.
\N<Segi>Well... I heard that today is Irime-san's trial by combat.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmm, I see. So you've come to witness the outcome. It's not
unrelated to you either. Make sure you burn it into your
eyes.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>...I've been waiting for you. Today is supposed to be your
last battle.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Even at this critical juncture, you seem no different than
usual.
\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Do you understand...? I'm betting on you.

\N<Segi>To say I'm unchanged... that's not true at all. You're
overestimating me. Look, even now my knees are shaking with
anxiety.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>...I thought so. That's natural. But still... I can't help
but hope that you, of all people, might be able to do it.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Ever since I've been stationed in this city and living in
Luda, I've witnessed various scenes, most of which were
horrific enough to make one want to look away.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>I understand that it's not in my nature to hold hope, being
stationed in Luda myself. Nor am I in a position to indulge
in such sweet sentimentality.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>But... still, I can't help but feel that way. And it's all
thanks to you, whoever you are.

\N<Segi>Why do you care so much...? Whatever happens to me is none
of your concern...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>That was the case... until now. But it seems that won't be
the case any longer.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>In any case, the time for a conclusion is near. Whether that
conclusion will be what you desire or not depends on the
path you've followed until now.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>If it's a path you've believed in and walked, it won't
betray you. I hope that the result is not something forced
upon you by someone else, but what you desired.

\N<Segi>Oh... right. If... just if, okay? If I can safely return
here... would you become my friend?

\N<Segi>Is that not allowed? Perhaps there's a rule in Luda against
making friends...?

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Haha... what an interesting woman. Very well, if you return
safely, let's have a drink together as friends.

\N<Segi>Oh, having a drink sounds so formal. But... I'm looking
forward to it.

\N<Man>To win in the training tournament, strength is of course
necessary, but knowledge of your opponents is absolutely
essential. It's not so sweet that you can win through mere
brute force.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hey, if it isn't Segi. What's up with bringing your son
along? I heard he was sick, but is he okay to be out and
about?

\N<Zuuteruka>Ah, today's the day for that mother-daughter battle, huh.
But as much as I hate to say it, unlike the training
sessions, this one's not open to the public, you know?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, you're curious, aren't you? I understand how you
feel. We're close, you and I. Alright, I'll make an
exception and give you permission.

\N<Zuuteruka>After all, it's practically like looking out for your own
future, right? Of course you'd be concerned, hehehe.

\N<Zuuteruka>Right? If your mom loses this fight, she'll literally become
my sex slave. You get that?
\N<Segi>Stop it! What are you saying in front of my son...!

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, it's fine, it's the truth. Of course, I'll allow
your son to watch the match too. But in return... he has to
be prepared to accept whatever he sees.

\N<Luda Soldier>As a life-prolonging measure for your husband who is
imprisoned, you are obligated to pay gold every 5 days
during the training period.

\N<Luda Soldier>The amount you are required to pay this time is \C[1][2000
MO]\C[0].
\N<Luda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm... indeed. You have worked hard. It would be good for
you to continue to strive.

\N<Luda Soldier>However... should you decide to stop the payments out of
self-preservation, we will simply proceed with the
enforcement without hesitation.

\N<Luda Soldier>What's this? You also do not have enough money on hand to
meet the conditions.

\N<Luda Soldier>What's wrong? Silence won't start anything. Do what you must
do.

\N<Luda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you were not up
to the task after all.

\N<Segi>Please, wait! If you could just wait a little longer, I will
definitely have the money...!

\N<Luda Soldier>You have already been given ample time. There will be no
further leniency.

\N<Luda Soldier>Come. While you may not be up to the task, fortunately, it
seems you still have some value to us.

\N<Luda Soldier>Your husband Yuia's temporary exemption has already been
approved. All that's left is for you yourself to take the
stage at the military training assembly.

\N<Segi>...If we're going to proceed... I have to change into that
black outfit...

\N<Segi>...If we're going to proceed... I have to change into that
black outfit...
\N<Segi>Excuse me... may I get through here...?

\N<Man>Eh? Oh, if it isn't Segi-san. I didn't notice you, please go
ahead.
\N<Man>Today's my lucky day, it was worth the wait here.

\N<Man>Ah... as always, what a nice ass. Makes me want to bite into
it...
\N<Man>Flaunting it like that... maybe you're inviting me?

\N<Man>Hehe... if that's the case, I'd like to ask for it right
now.

\N<Man>Hey, maybe I should just force myself on you...? Just
looking isn't satisfying enough...
\N<Man>Hey hey, stop it. Not in such a public place.
\N<Man>Damn it... this is like being left hanging.

\N<Man>Well, I guess I should be content just being able to worship
it like this.

\N<Man>Shit... I want to grab that ass and thrust into it from
behind...
